channel.title: Project Borealis hits major milestone with draft script and in-engine teaser
channel.description:
[img]https://cdn.neow.in/news/images/uploaded/2018/05/1525798092_houndeye_round_2-1200x0-c-default.jpg[/img]
[url='https://www.neowin.net/news/project-borealis-hits-major-milestone-with-draft-script-and-in-engine-teaser']Project Borealis hits major milestone with draft script and in-engine teaser[/url]
Yet another article from Neowin about a "an unofficial community-developed sequel to Episode Two based on Unreal Engine 4".

item.title: Project Borealis hits major milestone with draft script and in-engine teaser
item.dc:creator: TheLion
item.description:
Seems like a great idea, and good work done on it so far!

All the best to you guys!

Read full topic
item.source: Project Borealis hits major milestone with draft script and in-engine teaser

item.title: Project Borealis hits major milestone with draft script and in-engine teaser
item.dc:creator: The_Crazy_Gringo
item.description:
I came across Project Borealis through the documentary Unforseen Circumstances
It was only a matter of time, so good luck to the team!
